item.title: EMR on EKS VPA Review: 18 Months of Debugging and the Switch to ScaleOps
item.description: We tried using AWS’s built-in VPA integration for EMR on EKS to auto-optimize Spark executor resources. After 18 months of PoC work, multiple AWS support cases, and a custom manifest bundle rebuild, the operator still didn’t work. We abandoned it and switched to ScaleOps.
